amendment.description: To eliminate methyl tertiary butyl ether from the United States fuel supply, to increase production and use of renewable fuel, and to increase the Nation's energy independence.

vote.text: Amendment SA 850 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 29. Record Vote Number: 209.

action.text: Amendment SA 850 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Frist. (consideration: CR S7365-7369) To eliminate methyl tertiary butyl ether from the United States fuel supply, to increase production and use of renewable fuel, and to increase the Nation's energy independence.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 850 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 29. Record Vote Number: 209.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 850 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 29. Record Vote Number: 209.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 850 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Frist.
